Developing a submersible that can withstand extreme pressure and survive for extended periods in the deep sea.
Creating a team of experienced and highly skilled divers who are equipped with the latest technology and equipment to explore the ocean floor.
Establishing a network of underwater cameras and sensors to collect data and information about the ocean floor.
Partnering with marine biologists and geologists to gain a better understanding of the unique ecosystems and geological formations found at the bottom of the ocean.
Developing a plan to collect and transport samples of rocks, minerals, and other materials from the ocean floor to study and analyze in a laboratory.
